values: Not going to count the pidgeys before they hatch but it looks like my gym leader app got accepted for PAX Prime? Hopefully meaning I get to wander around and people will challenge me and those who win will get a little pin or "badge." HOW EXCITING. There's limits since not everybody who challenges is going to be a tourney fag, but either way I'm super stoked. Going with the normal type since I can use the name "AVERAGE JO" Hurrhurr. And trying to narrow down the team from these guys. Thanks Dee for the imaging tips! Really I just want to spam metronome.

Man, sometimes I wish I didn't follow the "bros before hos" code so intensely.  Talk about a DIY cockblock jeeze.

totally

Tagged and posting here instead of dA since I'm using that journal to whore myself out for commissions.


MEME NUMERO ICHI

1) First list all your OC’s by first name so we can see your list of all your wonderful OC’s.

1) Nicolas
2) Kuro
3) Kara
4) Hase
5) Suyin
6) Broccoli
7) Fizz
8) Mims
9) Dante
10) Hotaka

2) Who is your favorite OC?
I think its a tie between all of them.

3) Who is your least favorite?
I think its a tie between none of them.

4) Who is your most developed?
Ohgod uh its a tossup between Nick, Hase and Kuro.

5) Which OC would you want to date if they magically came to life?
LOL How narcissistic! I'd say Hotaka since he is a pretty nice legal aged guy. Eh kills people and makes food and doesn't afraid of anything.

6) How many girl OCs do you have? Boy OCs? It OCs?
Too damn many! I mean-

Girls: 4
Boys: 5
Genderless: 1

7) If you were stuck in a burning building what do you think the third OC on your list would do?
She would probably be the one who started the fire. And then in her half hazard explosively effortless way, blow stuff up until she reaches the exit while I barely make it out.

8) Name one thing you regret about one of your OCs.
That many of them are based off of some cartoon show.

9) Which of your OCs do you think would make the best father/mother/it parent out of all your OCs and why??
Oh Nick would make the best dad since it's his job to raise things in the first place. And he does want to be a father one day....sometime far in the future.

Suyuin would make the best mom because well, she is one!

10) Which of your OCs do you think will most likely be put in jail?
Probably Dante, though it wouldn't be intentional. He'd just get possessed by some horrible felon ghost and do terrible things without his knowing.

11) The eighth of your OCs was put into the future! What will their job be?!?
Mims is old! He already has a job owning a pet store and would probably be CRUSTIER and retired.

12) Name the first OCs catch phrase! (if they don’t have one just make one up)
"Howdy!"

13) Do all your OCs live together or are they separated?
Hurp derp

Nick and Broccoli are sort of set in the same world and might on the off chance run in to each other but nope!

Kara, Kuro, Suyin and Hotaka are also set in the same universe. None of them live together but Kara and Kuro crash at each other's places frequently and Hotaka spends way more time at Suyin's place than he should.

14) Are there any pairings that are in your OC list? (they can’t be with someone else's)
Nope! They're all either partnered with someone else, are too old, too young or asexual.

15) Your seventh OC switched bodies with you for a day! How will they react at the end of the day?
BLAGHASGHARGH *runs off a cliff*

16) Your last OC just became a fifteen year old. What do they do?
He'd probably laugh at being a skinny punk all over again. He would also crack up at his terrible bleached hairstyle.

17) Now randomly select a person on your OC list. Who was it?
Hase!

18) That OC you just chose? Yeah they think they are superman (even if they are a girl) and are on the roof about to jump off.
Because his brother pushed him off. Poor guy!

19) Are any of your OCs bored of this meme?
Probably.

20) Would your second OC prefer the beach or the mountains?
Kuro would prefer to stay indoors. But mountains because it has no fish.

21) Would your tenth OC battle a shark?
FUCK YEAH PUNCH IT IN THE FACE SUZUKI STYLE.

22) Which OCs hate each other?
None of them. o_o They're a pretty mellow bunch.

23) Which OC did you create first? And last?
Nick was first interestingly enough, back from 2004-05ish when he stabbed things instead of being a farmer. And ironically Mims, the old man, is the newest, created sometime this year.

25) And if those two were fighting, who would win?
FFFFFFF Nick is spry and young and fresh. Mims is old and crusty but is not a twig and had military training. But neither of them are really brawlers. o_o I CALL A TIE

26) Are your OCs fat or skinny?
I'd like to think I've got good range. Most are pretty average BUT:

-Nick is skinny/lanky.

-Kuro has a little muscle, probably the most average of the bunch. Not really fat or skinny.

-Kara has a bit on the pudgy/curvy side

-Hase is actually supposed to be kind of emaciated but I can't get his face quite right.

-Suyin is lean and kind of has the "ply board with nails" figure but has a good deal of muscle.

-Broccoli also kind of has baby fat but only in her face really. The rest of her is pretty average.

-Fizz and Dante both have also babyfat left over since they're still very young.

-Mims is a fatty.

-Hotaka is beefy

27) What are your first 2 OC's favorite foods?
Nick LOVESLOVESLOVES waffles. That's practically all he eats and it's a wonder he's not fat. Kuro will never admit it but he's a huge sucker for manapua/pork bun and will love anyone forever if they buy it for him.

28) If your listed OCs were in a fight to the death, who would emerge victorious?
Lolololol WELL- I'd say it'd be narrowed down between Hotaka, Fizz and Kara just because of their sheer brute strength and recklessness when it comes to being in a fight. Probably Kara because she'd just blow up everyone.

29) There's a zombie attack and your OCs are stranded. Who do they elect to be their leader?
Mims or Suyin. Mims has more experience for crazy situations but Suyin is way more down to earth.

30) During said zombie attack, who's the first to die?
Broccoli unless pokeymons are allowed. Poor girl.

31) Tag three or more people!
Your mom
Your mom's face
Your mom's ass

MEME NUMERO NI

A. List seven habits/quirks/facts about yourself.
B. Tag seven people to do the same.
C. Do not tag the person who tagged you or say that you tag "whoever wants to do it.”Fuck off I'm gonna do just that.

1. I need to draw something at least once a day, if I don't I get kind of twitchy and moody. I would blame art school but it has always kind of been like this, just not to that extent.

2. Cooking is something I find enjoyable. Food is fascinating and I love experimenting with stuff, so to be able to eat your experiments is something pretty awesome.

3. Speaking of food, I kind of have an oral fixation of sort. I run though packs of gum faster than a chain smoker cause I need to be chewing something most of the time, or I will start biting my nails and get worms or something. Or make food and get fat LOL.

4. Developing characters to the point where I come up with creepy incredibly obscure random facts is something I find enjoyable.

5. I paint my toenails vivid, eye searing colors around once a month. Currently it is lime green and neon pink.

6. I wear slippers in horribly cold weather because I like them that much.

7. About a week ago I got is a crowntail betta named La-Ve. He's pretty plain by betta standards but has these awesome ORANGE AND BLUE EYES so that totally makes up for it.

Officially a college graduate now.  Holy fuck.

Also I has suspenders now.  They are amazing.

One week of school left possibly for the rest of my life unless I flunk a class or take more courses.

 Also I have a sketchblog now because I hate spamming deviantart.  Visit visit visit!  And if you have one we must be friends!

http://flyingwalruses.blogspot.com/ http://flyingwalruses.blogspot.com/ http://flyingwalruses.blogspot.com/

Ps I just got a new tablet, holy moly this thing is amazing!  I never thought one could get so excited over a textured surface.

Sure can't wait to be done with school, three more weeks aaah!  Sarah's sister and friends came over and were the coolest houseguests in the world.  They brought chocolate and food we all went clamming and shtuff.  We got lots due in the next couple of weeks but I'm not gonna stress, it's all good.

MEME NUMBAH 2 stolen from windy

Jennings lollll.

Never ever.

Scream cry and destroy things.

Yesterday LAURIE LEARN HOW TO TEACH ERGH

I have mixed feelings about long hair.  It looks neat because you have to be patient and let it grow out while still keeping it nice and clean and can be put into different styles but oh good lord tangles and all that shampoo and it takes so long to dry omg.

The Kill from 30 Seconds to Mars shuttup I like their stuff.

All the time!

Done with school on a beach in oregon/hawaii chilling out with my favorite people uueh

Nope.

Nope.

Mine. D=

Some cool peeps every day.

Jess.  haha I sure do exchange texts with that guy a lot.

Have you ever listened to music you hated just to fit in?
I do what I want!

Who is the prettiest person you know?
YOU

What’s an interesting fact about you that not many people know?
When I get a character I really like I draw them nonstop until it gets worked out of my system and move on.  Also I have two huge blisters on my feet, ouchies!

What do you want to do after high school/college?
I don't knooooowwwwwwwwwww

Do you do anything embarrassing when no one is home?
Get naked every day!

Today because my mama is done with radiation!  She's the best person in the world I love her so muchhhh!

If you had the chance to move to a completely different state, would you?
I don't knooooowwwwwwwwwww

What is something you’ve always wanted a boy/girl to do for you?
I don't fukken know.  Not be a creep for once.

What do you wish you had more knowledge about?
EVERYTHING

PLUMS

How old were you when you stopped believing in Santa?
I think seven?  Once I figured out my moms handwriting.

What are the things you’ve learned over the past year?
Life sucks get over it.  Life is awesome, enjoy it.  Just because you don't have a plan doesn't mean you're screwed.  Friends are the greatest asset you will ever have, take care of them.  Don't let yourself be a doormat or you won't learn squat but it makes you easy to get along with.

Again, not something I keep track of.

I don't fukken know that shit don't matter to me.

I think?

My IRL friends, Jess and Karu they're the best.

Everyday.

Not in a thousand million years no.

Sure do!

Yep it's called not existing ooh

Working on homework every day until the end of the semester because I want my social life back.

Sure am.

Once!  It was the lamest prank call in the history of the universe and it makes me laugh so much.

No way never.  My dad does though.

I sure do want to do nothing but draw comics all day.

Hanging out with Ana was so cool omg, I think we're going to do it again sometime. Maybe my brain will actually function that time around too. She took me to this badass ramen shop and we drew in a cafe for a solid 5 hours, planning out our rounds, giving concrits and being silly overall. So now the last few pages of my sketchbook are filled with naked PCBC people. In that list includes Garret, Nick, Rosemary, Chiefy and Kylie. It's great.




I can't wait to see her round fully finished.

Your result for The Golden Compass Daemon Test...

Regal Soul

You love to be around people. Without them, you would wilt and fade away. Too much time alone leave you feeling listless and sad, but a good night out with your buddies puts the spring back into your step. You make friends easily, because you know how to adjust your behaviour for each person. With a rowdy, loud, social type of person you can be rowdy, and loud, and social. With a timid and mousy person you can be quiet and sensitive. While you have many friends and many faces, you have an inner circle of friends and family with whom you can truly be yourself.

You are a natural leader. You tend to be calm and rational, and it is rare that you get angry or upset. Often, when someone accidentally hurts your feelings, you will smile and pretend not to be bothered by it, because you want to project a positive, self confident image. You pick your battles. When someone does cross the line, they are often surprised at the sudden strength of your defensive attack. On the rare occasion that someone evokes anger or tears from you, it seems to them that this storm burst from clear blue skies.

Your daemon would represent your social, outgoing nature, your adaptable presence, and your tendency to hide your sensitive spots from strangers. He or she would help you mold yourself to every variety of social situation, being calm or playful or frightening as each situation demanded. When alone together, he or she would be someone whom you could share your real feelings with.

Suggested Forms: Lion, Orca, Chimpanzee, African Elephant, Goldfinch.

Take The Golden Compass Daemon Test at HelloQuizzy

Ahahah that was entertaining. I don't know about being "regal" but I'd like to think it's pretty accurate.

I'm such a stereotypical artschool nerd it hurts.  When I'm not drawing, I'm painting and when I'm not doing these for school, I'm doing them in my spare time...or sleeping but that's beside the point.

Got a whole bunch of new sketching supplies since my pencil box somehow managed to MYSTERIOUSLY DISAPPEAR.  It's ridiculous how much joy a .3 pencil, a tiny, tiny brush and new fonts for Photoshop can bring.

Parents are coming up to visit in a couple of weeks, I wish the reason for doing so was happier though.  Illnesses can kiss my ass.

I'm still debating whether or not to go to Sakura-con. D:
Laughing and crying at the same time is an interesting sensation.

BAHAHAHAHA I haven't slept in two days and I've been working on homework for the past 17 hours and I'm still not tired and there's an interview soon.

SUCK ON THAT FINALS!

EDIT: FUKKEN.......MOUNTAIN OUT OF A MOLE HILL FUCK!

.....I'm going to sleep now.

I wish my body would decide whether it wants to be sick or not. 

Self induced stress is a pain in the ass, I need to stop doing that.  But having a good shouting/screaming fit really helps.  Much love to my Mama, she's such a saint.

This is Angelfall is fun, I just wish my voice would stop being nasally, twitchy and stop talking so fast.  But that can be worked on.  Karu and I have some plans for the show I think, it's gonna be awesome.

Murr back to PCBC entry.  I'm against Waddles.  Huh, imagine that.

Um break was fun I guess, though everybody left right when Cyndi and I came over and BK/Keemfag/Jelleh/Chanae was busy with work but it was still nice to not have to get up early.

Mom got out of surgery just fine.  It was a total of 12 hours where they had to operate on the back of her brain and clip up another aneurysm. And though tired, she was quite functional and if all goes well she should be out of ICU in a couple of days and in about a week or so, out of the hospital completely.  I'm not a religious person but I thank whomever or whatever is taking care of her.  So everyday until Saturday, which is when I go back, dad and I going to visit her.  Then my aunties are all going to switch in and help out.

To celebrate papa and I went to go eat noodles and see Wall E.  And then tomorrow we're going to see Dark Knight...again.  xD

So as always, the trip back to Hilo was super nice. I was sad that Aloha and ATA airlines (both local) went out of business not to mention that the airline fares shot up so I couldn't go O'ahu to go visit my niece but other than that was good fun! Here's a quick list of some the things good and bad that happened over the break.

1. Hapuna visit! Found out that I can indeed drive for a few hours even after a day at the beach. Best day of the break EVER! We even got to eat malasadas, and other good foods like spam musubi and kalbi at the beach, listen to the Becky and Justin radio show on the way back and catch waves. (well sort of haha) Also we saw Guy over there and helped him dig this huge hole in the sand. And for once there wasn't tons of people so we could frolic more than usual. Then we went over to Osakas and had good food but my chigae tasted weird so Becky gave me some of hers. <33 All in all that was the highlight of the break.

2. Relax like a lazy ass. Cause that's what break is all about yeah?
3. Eat shave ice. With some tasty guava sorbet and go swimming too.
4. Cut like a foot of my hair off and put pink streaks in thar.
5. Turn 20. Brah, back when I was young....
6. Learn deep dark secrets about friends so you'll have trouble looking at them the same way for a long time.
7. See my cat and dog, Koko and Gobo. <3
8. Pick up trying to learn the guitar again. Ty bk for being such a good teacher! ;_; Now I just gotta find a place to buy one cheap over here.
9. Catch up on the Hilo dramas and learn some good insults from Justin.
10. Finally beat that stupid water temple in Twilight Princess thanks to Jaff.

Guy and the kids he was babysitting, Justin, Becky and Ami being great and Mr. Jaff.


Now I get to go back to school tomorrow....joy. Also BECKY I MISS YOU TOO FEG! First two things when I come back are guava sorbet icecream and hapuna. T_

a. Post a list of 15 fandoms.
b. Have your friends list guess your favorite character from each one.
c. When guessed, bold the line, include the character name, and write a sentence about why you like that character.

EDIT:  I'll just write down all the names because I'm a narcissist ok??

1. Mystical Ninja Starring Goemon/ Ganbare Goemon Ebisumaru: He's a fat ninja who likes dancing more than sneaking and is so crack he makes my brain hurt.
 
2. X-men: Nightcrawler: If for nothing else, his character design.  I like the older versions of him were he was a flirty swashbuckling goofball but him being serious (and religious I guess) is pretty sick.

3. Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann (this is a tie sort of) Viral and Kittan: Viral, holy crap this guy is just about everything I love in a smashed into one good thing.  Badass but a loser, has  a sweet secret and looks hella cool, not to mention his voice actor is Link. *_*  Kittan is so gar it's insane.  I think he's the only character in that show who can rival and possibly beat Kamina in manliness-YES I WENT THERE!  Plus he's a big brother, I love big brother characters. <3

4. The Mario games Luigi: Fuck. Yeah.  He is the best character in the universe.  (at least for me) Don't argue or I will eat your face.

5. Azumanga Yukari:  She leaves me in stitches.  I love her jackassery and just over all angry crack humor.  Also Yukarimobile ftw.

6. Air Gear Akito/Agito:  Cute and batshit insane.  Just the way I like it.

7. CAPTAIN PLANET! Okay I admit I just put it up there to be stupid. ._.

8. Naruto Kankuro: Yeah it was pretty obvious not like I use an avatar of him all the time.  Also protective older sibling, plus he looks weird but also cool.

9. Bleach Ichimaru Gin: He's a huge freaking jerk but at the same time not.  I love it!

10. Reborn (this is a three way tie) Yamamoto, Gokudera and Lambo:  YamaGoku = OTP! OTP!  And Lambo is a triple deal, totally whoopass when he's 25, handsome but still a crybaby at 15 and stupid and cute with a giant afro at 5.

11. Pokemon!! Not the trainers (also a tie) Squirtle and Wortortle: They are so cute. Nuff said.

12. DragonBall Z Gohan: He was such a cute kid and then turned hella cool in the cell saga.  After that he sucked. :<

13. Ronin Warriors (anyone remember this show??) Cye: A level headed, water using British guy.  Pretty cool if you ask me.  Also when I was younger I always thought he and Kento were gay for each other. O_o;;;;;  A yaoi fangirl without even realizing it.

14. Teen Titans Beastboy: Yeah he's pretty great.

15. Kikaider. <3 Ichiro: I liked his spunk in the anime, it brought some life in for a very serious show.

Shoot, I just realized I'm going to be 20 tomorrow. Dayum I feel old!  I tell you kids, back when I was young....Also the one time, ONE TIME I don't check my pockets before laundry there was something important in there, therefore my DS is now "clean."  Goddammit!  *goes back to attempting to make it work again

It feels so good to be back home!  Hilo is as muggy as ever but who cares, it's warm, there's my family, my friends.  I couldn't be happier, really. <3

So yeah Sakura con was really fun. Lots of window shopping and lusting after weird anime accessories but not actually buying them. Well aside from these sweet ass goggles I found at one of the stands. It was way over priced but I finally got a pair! So yeah I'm happy. <3 I also got an Endling print since Dave was there again this year yadda yadda no one cares. Was going to see the Dark Horse people too but Ali Project > Them. So there!

Cousin Megan, Cyndi and I also went to the "singles meet and greet" for shits and giggles, and though we didn't go out of our way to talk to anyone since we were there to watch the awkwardness of it all, I got hit on by this really creepy tall guy. I ended up telling him that I was from Canada and that my dad was an escapee from North Korea....Well I thought it was funny.

And meeting the AF peeps..well the awesome ones anyway was way fun. We saw some of the weirdest and most beautiful things there. Seriously!

Lets recap:

Surprise buttsecks L! Holy crap that was funny traumatizing. This tiny little L runs up to some guy unzips his pants, humps him in the butt and then runs away. Surprise buttsecks! The more I think about it the more awesome it gets.

Drag queens! Beautiful, beautiful drag queens! Inga! We love you! During the Ali Project concert (which was also way fun btw) they had drag queens dancing on the stage. And not only were they dancing, but then they stripped, then threw confetti all over the place then proceeded to do the robot. HOW RAD IS THAT?

Saggy cheeks/Old lady Faye. This was wrong on so many levels. It didn't help that she was standing right in front of us during the concert so I kept catching sight of her "cheeks" every so often. It was funny in the sense that it was scarring.

Yet another old lady, she had to be 60 at least. This time she was dressed in some sort of ball gown outfit with a very elaborate mask. I kind of wanted to hug her. O_O

Also there was Pedobear and his shooping buddy and a whole host of other cool cosplayers but those two were particularly lulzy. I wonder if they went to the 4chan meet.

By the way now whenever I see ramen or anything of the sort I will forever more hear "SODIUM DEATH!" In my head. xD Yeah that's pretty great.

I'll upload pictures in a bit but that's all for now.

Well not really.  

So I lost my round in the winter brawl, but it's cool.  Yeah I'm a little upset but honestly I knew it was coming, plus I really need to work on other more important stuff.  I think I had better art, but his stuff was better just in general. 


But what bothers me is how the heck did merchant make it past the second round?  Honestly I don't think his stuff is all that funny, it's over done and his artwork is well....it could use a lot of improvement.  Both of them had decent pace but zombie had a much better entry overall.   There are some other entries that I'm rather irritated about that made when their opponent's one was better but that's the one I'm really miffed about.  Glad I'm out of that tournament if they're going to use inconsistent, lousy judging, fuck that shit.

Once again Lina and I were hammering out story ideas on AIM the other day and among them was the yongsinxmaru thing we've been plotting for awhile. Combined with the fact that I finally found a good place to get yaoi on a regular basis, an abombination spawned. I can't draw lusty pics for the life of me but it was so much fun I had to share it with you kids. lol shameless The picture had some weird captions too but if they say anything that's up to you. >_>

So we had a glorious rain day today. During the weekend we had lots of snow which sadly all melted, killing any hope of a snow day. But then momma nature decided to throw a curveball and make it rain non stop for a few days thus flooding the highways and making the schools shut down. It let me do lots of catching up on my homeworks and internet social life.

So did anyone see the Heroes finale? I was so sad, they killed my favorite female character and another cool guy! *sobs* Why do all the characters I get atattched to die? Well at least Hiro and Mr. Bennett are still alive. Mr. Bennett always was a badass and now Hiro pulled a badass move too. This makes me happy. IF ANYONE SAW IT TELL ME WE NEED TO GEEK OUT MMKAY? D:

So while not paying attention in Art History yesterday I made a few DotE doodles of Jade and semi-character sketch for da Meskah boi. He looks like such a ridiculous slut, I wonder how he's going to say warm in the winter.

I was contemplating not posting this but ah what the heck, let's do this.

So I found out my Aunty is in the hospital right now.  She had pains in her leg and eventually got sent to the emergency room.  Turns out she had blood clots in her legs.  They asked her if she had trouble breathing, she said she's had a persistent cold for the past few months, which she did.  Turns out she has blood clots in her lungs too, in addition to a mysterious mass in there.  They're going to run some tests tomorrow but here's to much hoping that it's not what I think it is and that she will get better. 

Also a certain cousin of mine (lets call her K) has once again screwed up her life.  Her sister (let's call her C) let her stay at the house since K was having serious financial troubles in addition to being a new mom.  All K had to do was cook and clean and take care of her kid, that's it.  No working needed, no need to pay rent or bills.  Good bargain right?  So because of something incredibly stupid like oh I dunno, not listening and using the computer that was specifically for work purposes only (Cousin C is an engineer).  K has moved back to a condo that she can't afford while her "boyfriend" is chilling out in freaking jail in Arizona.  Apparently she's also been flinging money she doesn't have around instead of spending it on important things like food and rent or possibly saving it up.

If she didn't cheat on her husband in the first place this never would've happened.  I suggested to her mom that she secretly make a bank account for  Riley (K's daughter) for college purposes.  Don't want to have her life messed up because her mom can't get her act together.

Sometimes I wish I didn't care about my family. =/

 Edit: Okay it was what I thought it was. Now I'm just praying it's not malignant.

So everyone how was your Thanksgiving?  I trust it was a-okay and drama free.  I had the usual haole style with the turkey and gravy, nothing unique. Don't get me wrong the food was delicious, first real meal I've had for almost two weeks.  Actually my cousin's aunty made tiramisu!  Which is quite possibly one of my favorite foods ever. <3 

Uhh nothing really has been happening, I'm just procrastinating on stuff while waiting for my phone to charge so I can call Becky McBeck-Becks.  Oh yes, just three weeks until I get to go back to Hawaii!  I'm so happy about that, I can see all my Hilo buddies/family and eat cooking that doesn't taste like kimchi water.  Maybe dad can make some filipino food when I come back.  *drool*  I'm going to miss alot of hapkido practice which makes me sad but you know what?  The 80 degree weather and seeing everyone is so worth it.

Winter Brawl pages are doing pretty well, I have 10 pages drawn out and 3 of them fully inked and toned.  My hand is actually starting to twitch because I'm drawing so much.  Because in addition to that I also am working on my animation final which the teacher wants us to do frame by frame.  The animation itself is only four seconds minimum but when it's 24 frames a minute which comes out to at the very least, 96 drawings.  But that's okay because this is good practice and is going into the junior certification portfolio.  I still can't believe I'm going to be a college junior in January.  How exciting...I think.

Now I just have to finish writing all those not-so-delightful papers and everything will be just peachy.  I'm not worried about it yet though.

ALSO!  I sent in a character application for DotE, I hope it is acceptable. ._.;



1) What was your first Pokemon game?
Pokemon Blue oh yeah!

2) Can you remember who your starter was? If so, who?
Squirtle!  Water types ftw. <3

3) Did you ever complete the Pokedex in any games? Which one(s)?
I finished blue and yellow.  Yay for having mutilple game cartridges and a link cable.

4) Did you watch the Pokemon anime? Who was your favourite character?
Way back in the hanabata days.

5) Do you still watch the anime?
For the lulz.

6) What's your favourite Pokemon type? Explain.
Water!  Cause they have pwnsome designs of course.  And I just really like water based things.

7) Who's your favourite Pokemon? Explain.
Wartortle Squirtle and Gastrodon.  They're all so awkward and adorable I love them to bits. ;_;

8) Which Pokemon do you dislike the most? Explain.
Zubats.  I. Hate. Zubats.  They spam the dungeouns and give such crappy exp, not even worth killing them.

9) Which is your favourite region? Explain.
Ehhh. I like em all.  ~_~

10) Which is your favourite Pokemon series (ie, Kanto 1-151, Johto 152-251, Hoenn 252-358, others)? Explain.
Kanto of course.  Ahh the nostalgia.

11) Can you say a series Pokedex, without a reference, in order?
I know pretty much the first 250 and then some.  It's really pathetic.

12) Do you know all the type advantages, disadvantages and all the super-effective moves for each type?
What poke-nerd doesn't? ...I mean NO I DON'T D:!!  HALP!

13) Did you prefer Pokemon before the new ones, or after?
Some of the new ones are cute but they're running out of ideas.  Gamefreak hire me plz I have some fun ideas. >:3

14) Have you got an Original Character who is a trainer?
Kinda sorta not really no.

15) Have you ever wrote a fanfiction story about Pokemon?
I drew comics, does that count?

16) Was the OC based on yourself?
Yep, I'm actually a squirtle IRL.

17) Who is your favourite gym leader?
Brock cause he's easy, Giovanni cause he's cool and me cause I'm the best.  Just kidding.

18) What about Elite Four trainer?
Gary!  Quick leveling- I mean a challenge.

19) If you lived in the Pokemon world, who would you starter be? (Please choose out of the normal starters, excluding Pikachu and Eevee).
Squirtle yep yep.  He's mah boi!

20) Which city would you live in before you started your journey? Why?
Probably Pacifidlog town, I did live on a rock the middle of the ocean for most of my life.

21) Would you travel just in the one region, or spread to other places?
Travel, duh.

22) Would you train just one type, or different ones?
Probably have one main type with a sprinkling of different ones.

23) What kind of Poke-Person would you be? Trainer? Breeder? Gym leader?
I EAT POKEYMANS...trainer.

24) Would you collect gym badges? Or keep Pokemon as pets?
Combo attack!  I'd do both.

25) Who is your ultimate two-on-two team? Explain.
Zapdos and Gastrodon!  I can do nifty attacks that hit everyone but they wouldn't get affected because of their types.  Thilly gooth.
